code: import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'../axiosConfig';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GenresContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();const GenresProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[genres,setGenres]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchGenres=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/genres');setGenres(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching genres:',error);}};fetchGenres();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GenresContext.Provider,{value:{genres},children:children});};export{GenresContext,GenresProvider};
